data.md:MetaData: Loss on ignition on sediment samples of core DALMUT, Dalmutladdo, Norway
Local vegetation: Sphagnum mosses. Core diameter: 11 cm. Area: 7.2 ha. Lake. Physiography: depression in the valley. Surrounding vegetation: Betula forest. Vegetation formation: boreal forest.
Holocene vegetation and climate history on a continental-oceanic transect in northern Fennoscandia based on pollen and plant macrofossils
